msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Collection of religious verse and some prose.
msContents.textLang: Italian, with one prayer in Latin

msItem.title: Miscellany of religious verse and prose
La laude del corpo di Christo, f. 12r
La laude del corpo di Christo, f. 12r
La laude di Santa Caterina da Siena, f. 13v
La laude del venardi santo, f. 14 v
Laude di Santo Ansano martire, f. 18v
Oratione optima a nostra dona di misere, f. 37r

supportDesc.extent: 54 leaves : 212 x 143 mm. bound to 219 x 143 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, i (modern paper) + 54 + i (modern paper); [1-54]; modern foliation in pencil, upper right recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in cursive script by different hands.

decoDesc.decoNote: Red or blue initials, some with ornamentation (f. 12r, 37r); rubricated headings.

origin.p: Written in Siena in the 15th and 16th centuries (Zacour-Hirsch).
